name: Tsus, Hero of Luugal // Ukhaan, Deceiver of Luugal
text:
Vigilance
When Tsus, Hero of Luugal enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature with power 3 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
{1}, Sacrifice X creatures: Put X loyalty counters on Tsus, Hero of Luugal, then transform it. Activate only as a sorcery.
